title: Remove any remaining old contact numbers from bottom contact/footer areas

requirements.text: Scan the entire frontend codebase and static HTML for any remaining occurrences of the old phone numbers (e.g., “08514-247365”, “08514 247365”, “+91 9618158499”, “9618158499”) and replace them everywhere with the correct KVR Hospital numbers: “08514 220234” and “7207534210”, including updating any corresponding tel: links.

quotes: SOME WHERE SHOWING THE OLD NUMBER PLESE CHECK
there was down below contact no there is that

acceptanceCriteria: A full-text search of the frontend project (including frontend/index.html and all frontend/src/**/*.tsx files) returns zero matches for the old numbers: 08514-247365, 08514 247365, 9618158499, +91 9618158499.
All phone numbers rendered anywhere on the landing page (including bottom/below sections such as the footer/contact area) display only: 08514 220234 and 7207534210.
All call links use the correct tel: targets: tel:08514220234 and tel:7207534210.

requirements.text: Refactor the frontend to define the hospital contact details (phone numbers, tel: links, email, address) in a single shared constant/module and update LandingPage, ContactSection, and Footer to consume these shared values to prevent future inconsistencies.

quotes: SOME WHERE SHOWING THE OLD NUMBER PLESE CHECK

acceptanceCriteria: There is a single source of truth in the frontend for both phone numbers and their tel: links.
LandingPage, ContactSection, and Footer no longer hardcode phone numbers directly in component JSX; they reference the shared constants instead.
After refactor, the UI output remains the same (still showing 08514 220234 and 7207534210), and all tel: links still dial the correct numbers.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything in frontend/src/components/ui (these paths are immutable).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: No backend/Motoko changes (backend/main.mo should remain unchanged).
No changes to hospital branding, address, email, specialties, or page layout beyond what is necessary to eliminate the old phone number and prevent recurrence.
